member.name: M:TicketClassLibrary.Car.Price
member.summary: Returns price of a car with or without Brobizz discount.

member.name: M:TicketClassLibrary.MC.Price
member.summary: Returns price of a MC with or without Brobizz discount.

member.name: T:TicketClassLibrary.Vehicle
member.summary: Is a class of vehicle wich Car and MC uses, with normal properties of license plate and date.

member.name: P:TicketClassLibrary.Vehicle.LicensePlate
member.summary: Gets or sets the license plate of a vehicle, and throws an exception if it is more than 7 characters.

member.name: P:TicketClassLibrary.Vehicle.Date
member.summary: Gets or sets the date associated with a vehicle.

member.name: M:TicketClassLibrary.Vehicle.Price
member.summary: Returns the price of a vehicle. This method must be overridden by the classes that uses it.

member.name: M:TicketClassLibrary.Vehicle.VehicleType
member.summary: Returns the type of a vehicle. This method must be overridden by the classes that uses it.
